TaskDescription: Click button NewWorkpiece to add a new workpiece to the scene. As you can see it covers the light ray of first photocell in the process line. It's tag is PhotocellEntry. The ray must be interrupted to pass the test. Furthermore we need to program MotorCompressor to run when SwitchCompressor is active. Compressor is used to increase preasure in air tank and move pistons when corresponding valves are opened. To complete the test, MotorCompressor should run for 3 seconds to build up the preasure

ChatBubbles.Text: This is the button to add new workpiece. You can also press X on the keyboard.
This is the SwitchCompressor. Program it to turn on MotorCompressor.
If the  the preasure level bar is empty, pistons won't move.
